mainText:
Dear Friends, 

it is a great loss we had to face, when we saw the news on television. 

Steve was a great visioner and what we most admired, that he always thought of people and their needs, making their lives more valuable and showing us also how we can think about business and how business can be made. 

Passion, emotion, a beautiful mind - we will miss him very much.
author: Bogna
